General.Name: Holaluz-Clidom S.A
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Holaluz-Clidom, S.A. produces and sells electricity and gas. It generates renewable energy from wind, biogas, solar, biomass, and hydraulic sources. The company was formerly known as Clidom Energy, S.L. Holaluz-Clidom, S.A. was incorporated in 2010 and is based in Barcelona, Spain.
General.Address: Passeig Joan de BorbO 99-101, Barcelona, Spain, 08039
